Rita Ora left little to the imagination as she stepped out to enjoy a night in Hollywood over the weekend.

articles.author: Stuart Heritage
articles.title: Behind the scenes of TV’s first deep fake comedy: ‘None of it is illegal. Everything is silly’ - The Guardian
articles.description: Is that Harry Kane and Stormzy arguing over a broken patio tile? This new, CGI-assisted comedy is astonishing to watch – but is it ethically OK?
articles.content: Spencer Jones beckons me into a Soho editing suite. Do you want to see some of the stuff weve done so far? he asks, readying a clip of his new ITV sketch show. Its funny enough; a young impressionist… [+9503 chars]
